name: text
description: Popup's button custom text, default: ['fas', 'share']

name: icon
description: Popup's button custom icon, default: 'Share'

name: closeButton
description: Popup custom close icon, default: null

name: hasBackdrop
description: A boolean flag that indicates if the popup should have a back drop layer, default: true

name: backdropClass
description: Popup's back drop class, default: null

name: theme
description: Set button theme, default: null

name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Buttons order will be as you type it. default: [all buttons]

name: exclude
description: Exclude certain buttons. if defined, these buttons will be excluded, default: [ ]

name: show
description: Number of buttons to show, if defined 'more' button will appear

name: size
description: Buttons size, accepts positive and negative numbers e.g. -4, 2.5, 1...etc. default: 0

name: url
description: Sharing link, default: current URL

name: title
description: Override title meta tag for LinkedIn and Reddit, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag for LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Telegram and Pinterest, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag for Pinterest only, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: showIcon
description: Show buttons icons, default: true

name: showText
description: Show buttons text, default: false

name: autoSetMeta
description: Initializes meta tag inputs from SEO meta tags, default: true

name: disabled
description: A boolean flag that indicates if share buttons clicks should be disabled

name: opened
description: Stream that emits when share window has opened

name: closed
description: Stream that emits when share window has closed

name: popupClosed
description: Stream that emits when share popup has closed
